name: part_000
file: tmp_【#REBIRTH3D】Kureiji Ollie's 3D Birthday LIVE 2024 - REBIRTH, The True Me【hololive Indonesia】 [O607BZ8HwDk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Introduction sequence with dramatic character art and teaser clips from the upcoming performance.
Live performance of the song 'Bouken Desho Desho?' in a 3D classroom setting.

subtitles.original: 答えはいつも私の胸に...
subtitles.english: The answer is always in my heart...

subtitles.original: 何でだろう 花束を選んだ私です
subtitles.english: I wonder why I'm the one who chose a bouquet of flowers

subtitles.original: もっと回らない 運命さながら決められたけど
subtitles.english: Though it's like a fate that's been decided, unable to turn more

subtitles.original: 真似だけじゃつまらないのよ You be right
subtitles.english: Just mimicking is boring, you be right

subtitles.original: 感じるまま 感じることだけを するよ
subtitles.english: I'll do exactly what I feel as I feel it

subtitles.original: 冒険でしょ？でしょ？ 本当が嘘に変わる世界で
subtitles.english: It's an adventure, right? Right? In a world where truth turns to lies

subtitles.original: 夢があるから 強くなるのよ 誰のためじゃない
subtitles.english: Having a dream makes me strong, it's not for anyone else's sake

subtitles.original: 一緒に来てください どこまでも自由な
subtitles.english: Please come along with me, to wherever we can be free

subtitles.original: 私を見てよね 明日過去になった今日の今が奇跡
subtitles.english: Keep your eyes on me, today will be the past tomorrow, this moment is a miracle

subtitles.original: 戻れない どこまで行かなきゃ つまんない
subtitles.english: I can't go back, unless I keep going it's boring

subtitles.original: さあ教えて 秘めてる願いを 鏡に投げた
subtitles.english: Now tell me, I threw my hidden wishes at the mirror

subtitles.original: 体ごと受け止めたら Your my bright
subtitles.english: If I accept it with my whole body, you're my bright

subtitles.original: 驚かせて 驚いて笑顔に...
subtitles.english: Surprise me, be surprised, and turn into a smile...
